subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Trailing by 4-0 after six innings, the Mets overcame that deficit in the eighth inning on David Wright’s game-tying three-run homer, but gave it right back in the bottom half.
snippet: Trailing by 4-0 after six innings, the Mets overcame that deficit in the eighth inning on David Wright’s game-tying three-run homer, but gave it right back in the bottom half.
